data.text:
@GM3ZDH @g0fcu Just like flu. I don't remember panoia being associated with the flu.
It's all been hyped beyond reason.

@DawgAlfie @g0fcu It's not over & Omicron is not mild, it's different. But the most vulnerable & the unvaccinated can still get very ill.  Infection levels remain as high as they were at peak of Delta but +'ve side of Omicron is that it appears to leave protection against further infection.
@g0fcu Don't bother Simon, he won't - but you know what they say about arguing with an idiot  LOL!
@g0fcu @NeilAlderney The numbers can be (and were/are) very easily manipulated to suit a narrative.
@g0fcu @NeilAlderney Like flu, but nothing realistically we can do about it.

@NeilAlderney @g0fcu Had it too. Had a sample sequenced to confirm Omicron. It was very uncomfortable, bad throat mainly, for 4 or 5 days but that was it. Unjabbed and naturally immune now. It's still around, some people will be badly affected sadly, but we have to learn to live with it just like flu
@NeilAlderney Sorry to hear that. Hope you feel better soon.
